thread.title: Dems Form Plan to Pay Legal Fees for Illegal Aliens With Taxpayer Money
thread.title_full: Dems Form Plan to Pay Legal Fees for Illegal Aliens With Taxpayer Money

author: K. Campbell
title: Dems Form Plan to Pay Legal Fees for Illegal Aliens With Taxpayer Money

organizations.name: obama issues flurry of executive orders to tie trump

text:
URGENT: Obama Issues Flurry of Executive Orders to Tie Trump’s Hands 
In fact, the amount of taxpayer money needed to enact these mayors’ plans would “easily” be in the millions, according to The Daily Caller. 
If passed, California’s proposed bill could cost $10-80 million per year, and Los Angeles officials have already set aside $10 million to defend illegal immigrants in their city. 
But time is running out for some of these illegal aliens, as Trump has vowed to immediately deport 2 million to 3 million undocumented immigrants who have criminal records, as one of his first major acts as president.   
His fight against illegal immigration and for defense of our borders will likely be one of Trump’s greatest tests during his tenure, as several cities have already pledged to maintain their “sanctuary” status despite threats by the president-elect to cut federal funds. 
In fact, officials in Chicago, New York, Seattle, Boston, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Oakland, Providence, R.I., Santa Fe, N.M., Denver, and Washington, D.C., have all said they would continue to shelter illegal immigrants, Fox News reported . 
Now the mayors of some of these cities not only want to put Americans’ lives at risk by protecting criminals, but they also want their taxpaying residents to foot the bill for the defense of illegal aliens in immigration court. 
Hopefully President-elect Trump will stay strong on this issue and remind these liberal mayors and other politicians that we are a nation of law and order, and blatant disregard for those laws will not be tolerated.
